resources.string:
1. In the center of the app, user can see the current battery level.

 2. By clicking on the "enabled" toggle button, app starts running in the background.

 3. User can set the charging limit at which he wants to see the alert using the spinner.

 4. vibrate and sound buttons are used for sound and vibration during notification alert.

 5. As soon as the battery is charged fully or at the desired limit, user's phone starts vibration and ring. The user will get a notification to remove the mobile from charging. User can stop the sound by clicking on the circular "battery level" button on the main screen.
